message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm willing to pay $12,500 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it offers.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $13,250?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12,875. Can we meet at this price?
